Class InstructorAppController

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.controller.InstructorAppController
@RestController @RequestMapping public class InstructorAppController extends Object
REST controller for managing instructor applications.

Provides endpoints for students to submit, cancel, and retrieve their instructor applications, and for admins to retrieve all instructor applications.

See Also:
  • InstructorAppService
  • UserService

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentUserInstructorApp

      @GetMapping("/student/instructor-application") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole('STUDENT', 'INSTRUCTOR')") public ApiRes<Res<List<InstructorApp>>> getCurrentUserInstructorApp(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @RequestParam(value="status",required=false) String status)
      Retrieves the current user's instructor applications, optionally filtering by status.

      Extracts the user's information from the JWT, invokes the InstructorAppService.findByUserId(String, String) method, and returns a list of InstructorApp entities.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the user's authentication details
      status - an optional status filter to retrieve specific instructor applications
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a list of InstructorApp entities

    • submitInstructorApp

      @PostMapping("/student/instructor-application/submit") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole('STUDENT', 'INSTRUCTOR')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> submitInstructorApp(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid InstructorAppDto dto)
      Submits a new instructor application for the authenticated user.

      Extracts the user's information from the JWT, invokes the InstructorAppService.saveInstructorApp(User, InstructorAppDto) method to save the application, and returns a response indicating successful submission.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the user's authentication details
      dto - the instructor application data transfer object containing application details
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • submitInstructorApp

      @PostMapping("/student/instructor-application/cancel") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole('STUDENT', 'INSTRUCTOR')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> submitInstructorApp(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt)
      Cancels the pending instructor application for the authenticated user.

      Extracts the user's information from the JWT, invokes the InstructorAppService.cancelPendingInstructorApplication(User) method to cancel the application, and returns a response indicating successful cancellation.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the user's authentication details
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/admin/instructor-application/all") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<List<InstructorApp>>> getAll()
      Retrieves all instructor applications in the system.

      Invokes the InstructorAppService.findAll() method and returns a list of all InstructorApp entities.

      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a list of all InstructorApp entities

    • getAllPending

      @GetMapping("/admin/instructor-application/all-pending") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<List<InstructorApp>>> getAllPending()
      Retrieves all pending instructor applications in the system.

      Invokes the InstructorAppService.findPendingApplications() method and returns a list of pending InstructorApp entities.

      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a list of pending InstructorApp entities
